mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT sk.user_phone, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_idb "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckil s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
